projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Slow projectile with big area damage.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Big Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Using Fast Projectile allows you to avoid the slow defense systems.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Fast Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Using Cluster Projectile You can perform attack on a larger area.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Cluster Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Extremaly fast, but pretty fragile.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Rocket Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Slow projectile that soaks much damage but cause none.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Sponge Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Rotating chains that attracting attention of enemy defences
projectilesDefinitions.name: Chain Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Projectile split into deadly pieces when destroyed.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Dealy Cluster Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Fire Projectile sets hitted building on fire.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Fire Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Boomerang projectile allow You to attack from behind.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Boomerang Projectile

projectilesDefinitions.descriptionId: Carpet projectile bounce of castle walls, causing damage with each bounce.
projectilesDefinitions.name: Carpet Projectile

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: The hearth of your castle. The King, who must be protected by any cost, stays in this room. Upgrade it to unlocks new rooms and fortifications.
roomsDefinitions.name: Throne Hall

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: The Mint produces gold. Upgrade it to boost its production and gold storage capacity.
roomsDefinitions.name: Gold Mint

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: The Treasury holds your precious gold, and it may be destroyed and looted. Remember - the poor King is a weak King. Upgrade it to increase its capacity and durability against attack.
roomsDefinitions.name: Treasury

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: The Machine produces mana. Upgrade it to boost its production and mana storage capacity.
roomsDefinitions.name: Mana Machine

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: These storages contain the mana produced in the Mana Machine. Upgrade those to increase the maximum amount of mana you can store.
roomsDefinitions.name: Mana Storage

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Increased number of builders allows you to build more rooms simultaneously. Of course, you can always speed up their work by using red gems.
roomsDefinitions.name: Builder

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: In the Armory, your best smiths produce ammo for your catapult! Upgrade it to unlock more advanced ammo, and increase your destructive abilities.
roomsDefinitions.name: Armory

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: In this room ammo is kept. Upgrade it to increase the ammo capacity.
roomsDefinitions.name: Ammo Storage

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Upgrade the room to affect durability of catapult.
roomsDefinitions.name: Catapult Workshop

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: In this room, mana is utilized to reinforce production of ammo, increasing their vitality and the strength of the attack. Upgrade it to unlock improved and more powerful ammo.
roomsDefinitions.name: Ammo Lab

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: In the Academy of Magic, the greatest of the sages work on the spell book, a powerful artifact that helps bringing your enemy down.
roomsDefinitions.name: Academy of Magic

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Crossbow constantly attacks enemy catapults from the castle walls.
roomsDefinitions.name: Crossbow

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Cannon constantly attacks enemy catapults from the castle walls.
roomsDefinitions.name: Cannon

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: The Room creates a magical field, slowing down enemy projectile
roomsDefinitions.name: Speed Barrier

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Homing Missile follow the flying projectile. Good for fast ammo.
roomsDefinitions.name: Homing Missile

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Mortar deals a large damage on a specific area. Good to destroy ammo in group.
roomsDefinitions.name: Mortar

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Laser Ray continuous deals damage to one of the nearest projectile. Good for slow ammo.
roomsDefinitions.name: Laser Ray

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Roof

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Rooftop

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Room

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Smal Tower

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Wall

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Bridge

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Big Tower

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Loft

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Well planned system of fortifications turns your castle into a real stronghold.
roomsDefinitions.name: Coping

roomsDefinitions.descriptionId: Upgrading the Explorer room allows you to discover new land.
roomsDefinitions.name: Explorer
